```{r}
library(fields)
library(lattice)

load("DOC_baseFlow_weightedAvg_and_predictors.RData")

data <- DOC_baseFlow_weightedAvg_and_predictors
dim(data)


```

```{r}
data_for_BIC <- data[,-1]
data_for_BIC <- data_for_BIC[,-1]
full_mod <- lm(meanDOC ~ ., data = data_for_BIC)
BIC <- step(full_mod, direction="backward", k=log(nrow(data)), trace = 0)
plot(data$Year, data$meanDOC)
abline(BIC, col = 'red')
abline(full_mod, col = 'blue')
```
